pages.title: Purpose
pages.text: Separates dusts into tiny dusts: pyrochlore, bauxite, uranium neutral, and lithium. Attach a motor to the blue side of the middle block; item input should share that side. Single-block early game; multiblock boosts throughput later.

pages.title: Multiblock
pages.text: Stack (top->bottom): assembly_centrifuge_top, assembly_centrifuge_middle (IO/controller), assembly_centrifuge_bottom. The blue input marker is on the bottom centrifuge block—face that toward power and item input. Keep left/right clear for item flow; the middle block handles IO.

pages.name: Centrifuge Stack
pages.text: Top-to-bottom tower with the controller at the center. Visualize to see placement; coil sits directly under the bottom block.

pages.title: Coil + IO
pages.text: Place a giant_coil directly under the bottom block; without it, the centrifuge will not spin. Input on the left of the middle layer; tiny dusts exit on the right—blocked outputs pause processing. Conveyors or pipes keep dust moving between digester and centrifuge.
